notes: Navbar leverages text buttons, which are not available in versions of Tableau before 2020.

Template includes HCAT_Template_Reference and HCAT_Template_Wireframe. Reference is a demo dashboard highlighting the styles in these docs. Wireframe is a stripped down version you can use to start your own projects.
Template also includes all associated image assets - make sure they're in the same directory as your project
For tooltips, copy the HealthCatalystShapes folder to Documents/My Tableau Repository/Shapes folder
